column4: BRIEF-Citizens Financial Group Announces Redemption Of Subordinated Notes
column6: * CITIZENS FINANCIAL GROUP ANNOUNCES REDEMPTION OF SUBORDINATED NOTES
column7: * CITIZENS FINANCIAL GROUP - REDEMPTION ON JUNE 29, 2018, OF ALL OUTSTANDING 5.158% FIXED-TO-FLOATING CALLABLE SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE JUNE 29, 2023
column8: * CITIZENS FINANCIAL - REDEMPTION PRICE FOR NOTES WILL BE EQUAL TO 100% OF NOTES REDEEMED, PLUS ANY ACCRUED & UNPAID INTEREST TO, BUT EXCLUDING DATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-Citizens Financial Group Reports First Quarter Net Income Of $388 Million And Diluted EPS Of $0.78
column6: * CITIZENS FINANCIAL GROUP, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME OF $388 MILLION AND DILUTED EPS OF $0.78
column7: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.76 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
column8: * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $1,091 MILLION VERSUS $1,005 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
